publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7243 Aileen Campbell: Jessie Griffin, an HiQ Heroâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Jessie Griffin of Little Haven in Forth on becoming a regional nominee for the HiQ Heroes awards; encourages everyone to vote for Jessie in the finals to be held in Birmingham on 18 November 2010, and believes that this award would be just recognition for all the hard work that she has undertaken with the Little Haven centre, which offers support for people affected by life-limiting illness. Supported by: Ian McKee*, Bob Doris*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-7243 Jessie Griffin, an HiQ Hero (lodged on 25 October 2010) Jim Hume*, Angela Constance*
S3M-7243 Jessie Griffin, an HiQ Hero (lodged on 25 October 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-7243 Jessie Griffin, an HiQ Hero (lodged on 25 October 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*
